titles.title: Foreign Merger Subsidy Disclosure Act
Foreign Merger Subsidy Disclosure Act
A bill to require disclosure of foreign government subsidies in the premerger notification process, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Foreign Merger Subsidy Disclosure Act
This bill requires entities to disclose in their premerger notification filings to federal antitrust regulators content regarding any economic support they received from a foreign state.
